scripts.nixinx: npm run clean && npm run env:use:nixinx && npm install && npm run _check:build && npm run _git:push && next dev -p 3001
scripts.nixinx:quick: npm run env:use:nixinx && npm run _check:build && npm run _git:push && next dev -p 3001
scripts.nixinx:branch: npm run clean && npm install && npm run env:use:branch && npm run _check:build && npm run _git:push && next dev -p 3001
npm install && npm audit fix && next lint && next build && git status && git add . && (git commit -m "General Adjustments" || echo No changes) && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$b=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git push -u origin $b" && cls && next dev
scripts.all: npm install && npm audit fix && next lint && next build && next postbuild && next start
scripts.git: git status && git add . && (git commit -m "General Adjustments" || echo No changes) && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$b=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git push -u origin $b" && cls && next dev
scripts._check:build: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && next build && next-sitemap
scripts._git:push: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$b=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git status; git add -A; git commit -m 'General Adjustments' 2>$null; git push -u origin $b"
scripts.publish:nixinx: npm run clean:deep && npm install && npm run build:pkg && npm publish --access=restricted
scripts.deploy:nixinx: npm run clean:deep && npm install && npm run env:use:nixinx && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:pkg && npm run _git:push && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run dev:nixinx
scripts.build:pkg: tsc -p tsconfig.pkg.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.pkg.json && node scripts/copy-css.js
scripts.npm: npm run git && npm version patch && npm run build:pkg && npm publish --access=restricted
